actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Children, Family, Drugs, Alcohol.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Children, Family, Drugs and Alcoholism

official_title: A bill to amend the Child Abuse Prevention and Treatment Act to authorize grants to States for the purpose of improving child protective service systems.
short_title: Child Protective Service Systems Improvement Act of 1990

summary.text: Child Protective Service Systems Improvement Act of 1990 - Amends the Child Abuse Prevention and Treatment Act to authorize a program of grants to States to assist them in improving their child protective service systems. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Child Protective Service Systems Improvement Act of 1990
A bill to amend the Child Abuse Prevention and Treatment Act to authorize grants to States for the purpose of improving child protective service systems.
